author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: I'm not EL dev, but looking from a side I liked the idea that was proposed in the call - if EOF is included in the upcoming fork, then EL teams would be able to focus much more on Verkle after the upcoming fork. Just wanted to know which of EL teams are opposed to it?

content: I'm not EL dev, but looking from a side
